content: Jane, I’d like to know how you plan to render the gv file without converting it to a svg/image file. When I took a look at “The Book”, there was a directory for the Graphviz source files, i.e. .dot, .gv, and an image folder for source files that’s been converted. Is there something available that I’m not aware of?
I'm not sure yet @Charles Ellis O'Riley Jr.
either gonna look for online dot renderers or a github action to run dot
either way though we will be converting to an svg
though we may have to commit the svg, I'll have to check how other projects that use mdbook and dot handle this
I took a quick look and couldn’t find anything.
